text: John William Thompson (born 1888) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1888 births Category:People from Alnwick Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Alnwick Town A.F.C. players Category:North Shields F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Preston North End F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:1984 deaths
title: John Thompson (footballer, born 1888)
